comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Mrs. Elmer G. Laurence, from Cincinnati, OH, was secretary of the Woman's National Rivers and Harbors Congress -- and officer of other organizations. See, for example, books.google.com/books?id=m-INAQAAMAAJ&pg=RA7-PA4&amp... and books.google.com/books?id=LsUiAQAAMAAJ&pg=RA3-PA88&am...
